item.title: Gravel on the road, 17th November
item.description:
A vehicle has deposited gravel on the road outside Sainsburys and down towards the zebra crossing. Wheels cannot grip the road surface properly and the stones are being pushed across both sides of the road and onto the central reservation of the zebra crossing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 308, Erith Road, Barnehurst, Bexleyheath, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights for 3 lampposts are out for months, 17th November
item.description:
Street light pole has been knocked down by vehicle and hasn't been repaired in months. It has only been guarded off and is blocking footpath completely. Another 3 street lights aren't working and need to be repaired urgently for health and safety reasons
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Woodmill Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: All out - three or more street lights in a row

item.title: Street lighting not working, 17th November
item.description:
The street light of Hoskins Street, just outside Paul Rhodes' bakery/factory is not working. It is very dark after sunset (now 4pm) making the area feel unsafe. Could you please repair the street light. Thanks
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hoskins Street, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet
